main_definition: Duration refers to the length of time that an event or activity lasts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The amount of time taken by a particular phenomenon, process, or event to occur.
meanings_and_examples.example: The duration of the concert was three hours.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The length of an interval between two events or points in time.
meanings_and_examples.example: The duration between his appointments is one hour.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A period of continuous action, effort, or performance without interruption.
meanings_and_examples.example: She dedicated a full year to the duration of her studies abroad.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The time taken by an object in motion from start to finish, often used in physics and engineering.
meanings_and_examples.example: Calculating the duration it takes for light to travel one meter is essential in certain experiments.
